title: Oyo launches Shark Tank-inspired loyalty programme
description: Customers can avail a free night's stay after seven room nights, an additional 5% discount on Oyo's network of over 3,800 Wizard hotels in India, as well as other rewards in the form of Oyo money under Wizard Shark. Valid for three months, the programme offers free membership renewal. Originally launched in August 2018, Oyo's Wizard programme, with more than 4.4 million active members, is among the largest loyalty programmes in the hospitality industry in India, the company said.
